parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
